verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> remember<WH2142> David<WH1732> and all his affliction,<WH6031>
how he swore<WH7650> to Yahweh,<WH3068> and vowed<WH5087> to the Mighty<WH46> One of Jacob:<WH3290>
"Surely I will not come<WH935> into the structure<WH168> of my house,<WH1004> nor go up<WH5927> into my bed;<WH6210>
I will not give<WH5414> sleep<WH8153> to my eyes,<WH5869> or slumber<WH8572> to my eyelids;<WH6079>
until I find out<WH4672> a place<WH4725> for Yahweh,<WH3068> a dwelling<WH4908> for the Mighty<WH46> One of Jacob.<WH3290>"
Behold,<WH8085> we heard of it in Ephrathah.<WH672> We found<WH4672> it in the field<WH7704> of Jaar:<WH3293>
"We will go<WH935> into his dwelling<WH4908> place.<WH7812> We will worship at his footstool.<WH1916>
Arise,<WH6965> Yahweh,<WH3068> into your resting<WH4496> place;<WH727> you, and the ark of your strength.<WH5797>
Let your priest<WH3548> be clothed<WH3847> with righteousness.<WH6664> Let your saints<WH2623> shout for joy!<WH7442>"
For your servant<WH5650> David<WH1732>'s sake,<WH7725> don't turn away the face<WH6440> of your anointed one.<WH4899>
Yahweh<WH3068> has sworn<WH7650> to David<WH1732> in truth.<WH571> He will not turn<WH7725> from it:<WH7896> "I will set the fruit<WH6529> of your body<WH990> on your throne.<WH3678>

If your children<WH1121> will keep<WH8104> my covenant,<WH1285> my testimony<WH5713> that<WH2090> I will teach<WH3925> them,<WH1121> their children also will sit<WH3427> on your throne<WH3678> forevermore.<WH5703>"
For Yahweh<WH3068> has chosen<WH977> Zion.<WH6726> He has desired<WH183> it for his habitation.<WH4186>
"This is my resting<WH4496> place forever.<WH5703> Here I will live,<WH3427> for I have desired it.<WH183>
I will abundantly<WH1288> bless<WH1288> her provision.<WH6718> I will satisfy<WH7646> her poor<WH34> with bread.<WH3899>
Her priests<WH3548> I will also clothe<WH3847> with salvation.<WH3468> Her saints<WH2623> will shout aloud<WH7442> for joy.<WH7444>
There I will make<WH6779> the horn<WH7161> of David<WH1732> to bud.<WH6779> I have ordained<WH6186> a lamp<WH5216> for my anointed.<WH4899>
I will clothe<WH3847> his enemies<WH341> with shame,<WH1322> but on himself,<WH5145> his crown will be resplendent.<WH6692>"
